text: neohoe gaunde jonglyeonamuwa podonamuga issgo geu mit-eulo mul-i heu leumyeo modeun jonglyuui yeolmaega yeollineun gwasuwon-eul gajgo iss-euna insaeng-i neulg go jasigdeul-i eolyeo dolboji moshae gang han pogpung-usog-e hwibssayeo yuhwangbul-ui bab-i doel huimangjaga issgessneunyo geucheo leom hananim-eun neohoedeul-ege jinghuleul balghyeo neohuiga saeng-gaghal su issdolog ha sinila
